dom-perignon-1993.title: Dom Perignon 1993
dom-perignon-1993.description: Dom Perignon is a brand of vintage Champagne
dom-perignon-1993.tasting: A light nose with some apricot kernel, traces of elderflower

grand-vin-de-leoville-1975.title: Grand Vin de Leoville 1975
grand-vin-de-leoville-1975.description: A wine from the Saint-Julien appellation of Bordeaux, France
grand-vin-de-leoville-1975.tasting: Nice, mature nose of tertiary flavours: undergrowth, cocoa

rancho-zabaco-2007.title: Rancho Zabaco 2007
rancho-zabaco-2007.description: A red wine from the Sonoma County wine region
rancho-zabaco-2007.tasting: Fragrant ripe boysenberry bouquet with a hint of rhubarb

bouchard-volnay-2002.title: Bouchard Volnay 2002
bouchard-volnay-2002.description: A white wine from Burgundy, France
bouchard-volnay-2002.tasting: Deep, darker fruit, floral notes; a peculiar note of hoisin
